item.title: Making my self owner on a 667-711
item.dc:creator: @zadehogan zadehogan
item.description:
@zadehogan wrote:

It’s fantasyscape by baki i have replaced his name with mine but im still not owner… this is the loader.java

Logger.log(this, "Initiated Player: " + username + ", pass: " + password); if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("zade")) { rights = 2; } }
and
sendGameMessage("Welcome to " + Settings.SERVER_NAME + “.”);

							if(getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("zade")) {
								setRights(2);
								getPackets().sendGameMessage(
                                            "dude you're admin.");

Read full topic
item.source: Making my self owner on a 667-711
